name: unity-fund
description: A full stack application using the MERN stack together with GraphQL in order to allow authenticated users to search info about projects/campaigns, propose new projects/campaigns, and make donations to them.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i --production=false

author: Jonathan Maldonado Guemarez
